This album shows the contents of the early Ming Dynasty tomb of Zhu Zhanji, Prince Liangzhuang (1411-1441), who lived at the time of the great Chinese explorer Zheng He. The tomb was excavated in 2001. It is one of 7 albums I've created for this provincial museum. Photos by Gary L. Todd, Ph.D., Professor of History, Sias International University, Xinzheng, Henan, China. http://picasaweb.google.com/GaryLeeTodd/MingTombOfPrinceLiangzhuangHubeiMuseumWuhan#
